title: Joining TD Securities as Market Risk Analyst
preview: I have accepted an internship position at TD Securities as a Market Risk Analyst, where I will be working on risk assessment and financial modeling.
fullText:
I have accepted an internship position at TD Securities as a Market Risk Analyst, where I will be working on risk assessment and financial modeling.

As a Market Risk Analyst, I will be monitoring daily trading activities across $2B+ fixed income and equity portfolios, ensuring adherence to prescribed risk limits. I will also be performing stress tests and VaR analyses for monthly market risk reports, strengthening the bank's risk management framework.
